name: Keep the mech cool
description:
My entry for VimJam3, a small game about a huge mech fighting tiny tanks.

Focus: Multi-use -> The mech can pick up ressource-barrels that can be used for health, cooling down or ammonition.

Theme: Turn up the heat -> The mech will overheat if you don't cool it down

Controls:
WASD for movement 
mouse to aim with the main weapon
left-click to shoot
space to shoot rockets
123 to use the ressource barrels (1 heal, 2 cool, 3 new rockets)

There are voice-overs explaining everything in the level

This prototype only includes 1 level, your goal is to destroy all tanks
